slider.title: Inception
slider.description: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal secrets gets a chance at redemption.

slider.title: The Dark knight
slider.description: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

slider.title: Avengers: Endgame
slider.description: The Avengers assemble one final time to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance.

slider.title: Doctor Strange
slider.description: Batman faces his most formidable foe, the Joker, who plunges Gotham into anarchy.

slider.title: The Matrix
slider.description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora becomes torn between following orders and protecting an alien civilization.
